name: Rendering Ranger R2
description:
Rendering Ranger R2 is a shooter-platformer game developed by Rainbow Arts. It came out on 17-11-1995. It was published by Virgin Interactive. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Rendering Ranger R2 on SNES.
It was produced by Thomas Brockhage. It was scored by Jesper Olsen and Stefan Kramer.
